channel.title: Killing Monsters and Getting Dungeoneering Exp [Dementhium] [639]
channel.description:
How would i go about making a specific NPC provide dungeoneering experience if it is killed.
Mainly, i really just need to know what file i would need to edit, and the Skill ID/Number of Dungeoneering, if somebody would like to provide me with a snippet of what i have to put that will be more than helpful as well.
Thank you for your time, and seeming consideration.
Have a great day.
